page.title: 15Survey on the village shop 2
page.content: We continued to question the customers as they entered the village shop. The next question asked was: "Do you think a village shop is important?" Everybody said "Yes" and five people said "Very important" When asked "Why?" people answered that they thought the shop was important for: a)Old people b)Handy when you had run out of anything c)Meeting other people The next question was if people thought the prices in the shop were right: Most people thought they were perhaps a little on the high side. It seems difficult for a small village shop to compete with the big town supermarkets,but people still need them
